document_data.name: Moonwatch Hills
document_data.mainbody: The '''Moonwatch Hills''' were a grouping of rather unremarkable hills in the [[Moonsea]] region of [[north Faerûn]].{{Cite dungeon/170/Monument of the Ancients|56}}{{Cite adventurers league/Outlaws of the Iron Route|33}}
document_data.Geography:
They were situated along the northern coast of the [[Moonsea (lake)|Moonsea]] proper, just east of the [[Twilight Marsh]].

The [[Phlan Path]] wound through the hills, connecting the cities of [[Phlan]] and [[Melvaunt]] located on either side.
